text: int main ( ) { int t , n , a [ 100000 ] , b , c , i , j , k , s ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= t ; i ++ ) { b = 0 ; c = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( j = 0 ; j < n ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ j ] ) ; } s = a [ 0 ] ; for ( j = 1 ; j < n ; j ++ ) { if ( s <= a [ j ] ) { s = a [ j ] ; b ++ ; } else { c = c + b * ( b + 1 ) / 2 ; b = 0 ; s = a [ j ] ; } } if ( b != 0 ) { c = c + b * ( b + 1 ) / 2 ; } printf ( "%d\n" , c + n ) ; } return 0 ; }

int t , n , a [ 100000 ] , b , c , i , j , k , s ;
for ( j = 0 ; j < n ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ j ] ) ; }
